amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that nothing in this Act shall be construed to modify any statutory standard or requirement or to alter any statutory or judicial deadline.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the "super mandate" preemption clause and replacing it with a statement that nothing within the provisions of the bill may be construed to modify any statutory standard or alter pre-existing deadlines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 181 - 238 (Roll no. 180).
